meanings.sent1: The grommeted curtains added a touch of style to the room.
meanings.sent2: The tarp was grommeted to withstand strong winds.
meanings.sent3: The grommeted shoes made the clown look surprisingly fashionable.
meanings.sent4: Her grommeted bag was a fortress of organization.
meanings.sent5: The grommeted belt held up his pants securely throughout the day.

meanings.sent1: The grommeted banner fluttered in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The tent was grommeted to the ground to prevent it from blowing away.
meanings.sent3: She grommeted the papers together to keep them from flying around.
meanings.sent4: The grommeted leash kept the dog close during the walk.
meanings.sent5: His grommeted backpack kept his belongings safe during the hike.
